text: John Norman Frank Robertson (May 8, 1929 â€“ February 19, 2020) was a Canadian sailor. He competed at the 1948 Summer Olympics in the Star class and at the 1952 Summer Olympics in the Dragon class. Robertson died on February 19, 2020 in Burlington, Ontario. He was 90. ==References== ==Other websites== *John Robertson at Sports-Reference.com Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:1948 Summer Olympics Category:1952 Summer Olympics Category:Olympians for Canada Category:Sailors
